response.original_title: The Cleveland Orchestra Violins of Hope Concert
response.overview: Played before and during the Holocaust, the Violins of Hope instruments have been painstakingly restored by Amnon Weinstein, a second-generation violin-maker, and serve as testaments to the resilience of the human spirit and the power of music to lift hearts in even the most horrific of circumstances.
response.title: The Cleveland Orchestra Violins of Hope Concert
